title: Sound On: Senator Kevin Cramer and Markets Spooked
itunes:title: Sound On: Senator Kevin Cramer and Markets Spooked
description:
Bloomberg Chief Washington Correspondent Kevin Cirilli delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.

Guests: Craig Gordon, Bloomberg Washington DC Bureau Chief, Chris Meekins, Healthcare Policy Analyst, Raymond James, Erin McPike, Political and Media strategist, John Sitilides, Geopolitical strategist at Trilogy Advisors and diplomacy consultant to the State Dept, Republican Senator Kevin Cramer (ND)

To listen on the Bloomberg terminal, click on the player thumbnail on the sidebar.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
